dct_title_s: Energy map of the world / produced by Petroleum Economist, a division of Euromoney Global Ltd. in association with GDF Suez ; designed by K. Fuller and P. Bush. (Map)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading gradients Depths shown by shading and bathymetric tints. Includes inset of Japan, 2 ancillary maps, statistical tables, and graphs. Title panel and advertisement on verso.
